description_html: Innovations’ draperies and sheers complete the room. The collection of 16 patterns address the wide range of design needs: sheers, textures, large-scale patterns, acoustical, dim-out and double-width options, all woven with fire-retardant fibers. This complete line, featuring subtly layered textures of various colors and patterns, is a natural extension of Innovations’ sophisticated solutions for the vertical surface, moving the practical into artistic without compromising durability or practicality.
